borrow(address,uint256,address).details: Whitelisted agents can borrow any amount, LTV is handled by Agent contracts

burn(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.details: Asset is withdrawn from the reserve or divested from the underlying vault

params._amountIn: Amount of cap token to burn

mint(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.details: This contract must have approval to move asset from msg.sender

params._amountIn: Amount of asset to use in the minting

redeem(uint256,uint256[],address,uint256.details: Assets are withdrawn from the reserve or divested from the underlying vault

params._amountIn: Amount of Cap token to burn
params._minAmountsOut: Minimum amounts of assets to withdraw

addAsset(address).notice: Add an asset to the vault list

assets().notice: Get the list of assets supported by the vault

burn(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Burn the cap token for an asset

currentUtilizationIndex(address).notice: Up to date cumulative utilization index of an asset

mint(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Mint the cap token using an asset

redeem(uint256,uint256[],address,uint256.notice: Redeem the Cap token for a bundle of assets

removeAsset(address).notice: Remove an asset from the vault list

totalBorrows(address).notice: Get the total borrows of an asset

totalSupplies(address).notice: Get the total supplies of an asset
